EmailTemplate.name: Deactivated User Manager Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your subordinate’s Salesforce user is deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.Manager},
You received this message, because Salesforce user {!User.Username} (Organization ID {!Organization.Id} ) has just been deactivated and you are set up as his user’s manager. If there are any valid business records assigned to user, you are responsible for re-assignment them to new owner. If you need support with re-assigning objects, please contact your local Salesforce administrator.
Thank you, SFDC Team
